description: Jealousy or envy made visible - a tight, possessive or comparative flare that leaks into glare and posture.
actor_description: It hits like a small, humiliating clamp in my chest. I compare without meaning to. I want to pretend I don't care, but my attention keeps snapping back to what they have—or who they have. I feel possessive, exposed, and a little sick about it.
description_text: A tightness crosses {actor}'s expression—jaw set hard, eyes narrowing as a brief glare flickers toward the object of their envy before they try to smooth it away.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear {actor}'s voice tighten—words clipped a little too clean, like they're forcing calm through their teeth.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: The air around {actor} feels taut and prickly, like tension pulled tight and held just under the skin.
